remarks: The units of ` ZZ ` are the integers with norm ` 1 ` , i.e. ` 1 ` and ` -u 1 ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ zringunit as of 9-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
zrngunit.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
zrngunit $p |- ( A e. ( Unit ` Z ) <-> ( A e. ZZ /\ ( abs ` A ) = 1 ) ) $.
